alert.note: Alert for Northern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 3:13AM PST until January 13 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Most likely snow fall of 8 to 13 inches at Scott Mountain Summit. 2 to 5 inches of wet snow along lower elevations of Highway 3. 1 to 3 inches of wet snow on Highway 299 near Buckhorn Summit. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Trinity County. * WHEN...Until 9 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lower snow levels are possible in the Trinity Horn, notably around Trinity Lake, Carrville, and Coffee Creek.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
